title: Case Details
description: Represents the details of the case for which the application for Legal Aid is related to.

urn.description: The Unique Reference Number for the case e.g. 12AB3456789

caseType.description: The case type, based on data from TOGDATA.CASE_TYPES table. Note 'COMMITAL' is spelt as it appears in the DB and no attempt has been made to correct it to 'COMMITTAL'

offenceClass.description: The class to which the offence is classified as. Note that different offences can be under the same class
